name: Cyclones (itch)
description:
Controls:

Move: Arrow Keys or WASD
Jump: Up, Space or W

Background:

Bound by the soul's negation to fall into an undying slumber, this one must perish, begin anew, pattern a fatal disencumber. 

As the rain becomes a myth, a psychological drought plants itself deep within their roots.

But through all my actions, I will ensure their essence will not dry, my cardinal pursuit.
This crude spirit will rise alive,
in my eye, they'll see the light,
and to be the one, I grant a white light.
Click inside to begin a new life.

Created by:

Nicolai Bonde - Code, Gameplay and Level Design

sN0wBody - graphics and animations

Daniel Galletti - Music and SFX

JamJam0011 - Story

This game was developed under 100 hours for the Extra Credits Game Jam #3.
